record.description: U. of C. women stretch to avoid the two-way stretch. Tests to classify women for physical conditioning classes organized in co-operation with civilian defense authorities are taken by co-eds at the University of Chicago. Stretching, possibly to avoid the two-way stretch and thereby save rubber for defense, are Elizabeth Thomson, who leaps an imaginary bomb crater; Vivian Carlson who tosses a four-pound medicine ball for distance, and Mrs. Leon Carnovsky who ducks under a badminton net representing barbed wire.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached news clipping, fuzzy material on back, paint on surface.
